title: Has Satan seen Allah? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: question did satan see allah azzawajal the answer is no if our prophet islam did not see allah azzawajal and jibril peace be upon him who is the greatest of allah's angels did not see allah azzawajal and he had a limit where he had to stop and we are told that we cannot see allah azza was until the day of judgment when allah gives this privilege to the inhabitants of paradise then definitely satan did not see allah and allah azza knows best
